name: Medical Counselling
description: Counsellors sometimes work in general practices to treat patients with mental heath problems in primary care

name: Qualified Doctors
description: We have a team of experienced and qualified doctors. Call us to know more about our doctors and staff.

name: Emergency Care
description: In case of an emergency, feel free to contact us. Our doctors will provide you with the right assistance at the right time.

name: Covid-19 Vaccine
description: COVID-19 vaccines are 100% free for every individual living in the United States - even if you do not have insurance.

name: Medication
description: We assessed the effect of early in-hospital pharmacist-led medication review on the health outcomes of high-risk patients.

name: Neurological Surgery
description: Our surgeons are concerned with the diagnosis and surgical treatment of disorders which affect any portion of the nervous system.
